title: Convert Any Image to an SVG File for Free

steps.title: Go to https://www.adobe.com/express/feature/image/convert/svg in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.adobe.com/express/feature/image/convert/svg in a web browser. Adobe's free online image converter makes it easy to convert an image to SVG without downloading software. You will need to sign in to an Adobe account to use the tool, but it's free. Just click Sign In to log in now. If you don't have an Adobe account, you'll be prompted to create one. Computer and tech specialist Luigi Oppido warns against using other conversion websites that don't require a secure log-in, especially if your files contain personal information like bank account or social security numbers.

steps.title: Upload the photo you want to vectorize.
steps.content: Upload the photo you want to vectorize. Click the Upload your photo button, then drag and drop the image you want to convert to the box. Alternatively, you can click the center of the box to open a file browser and select your image.

steps.title: Click Download.
steps.content: Click Download . This downloads the converted SVG file to your default downloads folder .

steps.title: Go to https://image.online-convert.com/convert-to-svg in your web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://image.online-convert.com/convert-to-svg in your web browser. This free website can convert just about any type of image file to the SVG (.svg) format. It's best to only use third-party converters like this one if your image doesn't contain personal information.

steps.title: Click Choose File.
steps.content: Click Choose File . It’s the gray button near the center of the page. This opens your computer’s file browser. If the image you want to convert is somewhere on the web, click the down-arrow next to the button, then choose From URL instead. You can also find other upload options on the down-arrow menu, including the ability to select an image from Dropbox and Google Drive.

steps.title: Select the image you want to convert and click Open.
steps.content: Select the image you want to convert and click Open . The file is now ready to be converted.

steps.title: Click START.
steps.content: Click START . This converts the file to a ".svg" file. After a few seconds, the image will be saved to your Downloads folder by default. If prompted, click Save to start the download.

steps.title: Go to https://www.creativefabrica.com/studio/features/vectorize-image/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.creativefabrica.com/studio/features/vectorize-image/ in a web browser. This is another online image converter that can convert your images into full-color vector graphics (SVG) for free. Only use online converters like this one if the image you're converting doesn't contain any personal or sensitive information.

steps.title: Click Add your image here.
steps.content: Click Add your image here . It's the green button in the center of the page. This opens the vectorizer app in a separate window.

steps.title: Upload an image you want to vectorize.
steps.content: Upload an image you want to vectorize. You can drag and drop an image into the bar at the top. Alternatively, you can click the purple box in the upper-right corner that says Pick image to vectorize , select an image, and click Open . Allow a few minutes for the image to vectorize.

steps.title: Click Download Vector.
steps.content: Click Download Vector . It's the purple button at the top. This downloads the image in SVG format to your Downloads folder.
